articles.description: The Highland Games in Braemar, which are often attended by the Queen and the prime minister of the day, are usually a highlight in the monarch's calendar.
articles.content:
The Queen will not attend the Braemar Gathering this weekend as concerns continue over her health and mobility issues, with royal sources saying the decision has been taken 'for her comfort'.
